what.lead: Protect the dignity and safety of workers,
what.text: especially in new sectors. Provide workers with non-traditional long-term contracts (e.g., gig, platform, freelance) with standards of protection comparable to those applicable to traditional forms of work.

what.lead: Create flexible workplaces via an EU-wide Working Time Choice Act,
what.text: enabling workers and employers to negotiate flexible forms of work that reflect the needs of the individual, the team, and the business.

what.lead: Prepare the European labour force for the challenges of tomorrow,
what.text: by setting up the European Sector Skills Council to research the skills needed in the future. This will enhance synergies between the private and public sector.
